structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.text: Neither the commissioner of the Department for Behavioral Health, Developmental and Intellectual Disabilities of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services nor his deputy nor any superintendent or director of an institution of the Department for Behavioral Health, Developmental and Intellectual Disabilities shall be permitted to engage in any partisan political activity.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 70, effective July 12, 2012; and ch. 158, sec. 36, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 307, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 252, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 428, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 56. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 47. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 4. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 9.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). This statute was amended by 2012 Ky. Acts chs. 146 and 158, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
